Imagery Description: HalfNon Sepcifieddraped woman seated between young satyr, bending forward, and nude youth, with drapery over his left shoulder; Below the handles: female heads. This is a fairly early vase to judge from the treatment of the seated woman and the heads below the handles (see below, p. 321); the youth is seen in almost frontal view, but has been repainted.
Artist: The Painter of Naples 2585 and his circle
